A blowe for the Pope Touching the Popes prerogatiues. Extracted word for word out of the Booke of martyres. Actes and monuments. Selections Foxe, John, 1516-1587.
[2], 46 p.
Printed by Iohn Wreittoune, Edinburgh : 1631.
Selections from John Foxe's "Actes and monuments" (also known as "The book of martyrs"). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
